<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Create</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    // implement resource here
	var payload = request.body.data;
	var gr = new GlideRecord('incident')
	gr.initialize();
	gr.short_description = payload.short_description;
	gr.caller_id = payload.caller_id;
	gr.insert();

	var result = {
		number : gr.number
	}
	response.setBody(result)

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_288685_my_new_ap/createincident/create</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/create</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-05 08:35:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>0392fe0a8333021075f4b3a6feaad395</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MY NEW Application" source="x_288685_my_new_ap">60fb1ea08343021075f4b3a6feaad31a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MY NEW Application">60fb1ea08343021075f4b3a6feaad31a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_0392fe0a8333021075f4b3a6feaad395</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-05 08:54:00</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="CreateIncident">4f423a0a8333021075f4b3a6feaad331</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
